string.text: This is the encyclopedia. As you progress in the game, information about the world around you will be added here, sorted by topic.
Trader: get inside the army outpost and steal the case containing the report of the military expedition to the northern part of the Zone.
So that's how it is. Turns out that assignment on my PDA was-- I don't get it. To kill myself! I need to find this Journalist...
...came to in the den of some dude, can't remember anything. Just have a PDA on me with a picture of some other dude. There's just one message in the PDA - kill Gunslinger.
